title.rendered: Airlines operating from Abu Dhabi International Airport

content.rendered:
View the list of airlines operating from terminal 1 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates and the contact details of each airlines.

Air India

Air India airlines operates from terminal 1A of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Air India Express

Air India Express airlines operates from terminal 1A of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Air Serbia

Air Serbia airlines operates from terminal 1 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Air Seychelles

Air Seychelles airlines operates from terminal 3 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

AirBaltic

AirBaltic airlines operates from terminal 1 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Airblue

Airblue airlines operates from terminal 2 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Alitalia

Alitalia airlines operates from terminal 1 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Biman

Biman airlines operates from terminal 2 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

British Airways

British Airways airlines operates from terminal 1 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Cargolux

Cargolux airlines operates from terminal 1A of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Egypt Air

Egypt Air airlines operates from terminal 1 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Etihad Airways

Etihad Airways airlines operates from terminal 1 and terminal 3 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Fly Nas

Fly Nas airlines operates from terminal 1A of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Gulf Air

Gulf Air airlines operates from terminal 1 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Jet Airways

Jet Airways airlines operates from terminal 1 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

KLM -Royal Dutch Airlines

KLM -Royal Dutch Airlines airlines operates from terminal 1 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Kuwait Airways

Kuwait Airways airlines operates from terminal 1 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Middle East Airlines

Middle East Airlines airlines operates from terminal 1 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Oman Air

Oman Air airlines operates from terminal 1 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Philippine Airlines

Philippine Airlines airlines operates from terminal 1 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

PIA

PIA airlines operates from terminal 2 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Rotana Jet

Rotana Jet airlines operates from terminal 2 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Royal Jordanian

Royal Jordanian airlines operates from terminal 1 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Saudi Arabian Airlines

Saudi Arabian Airlines airlines operates from terminal 1 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Shaheen Air

Shaheen Air airlines operates from terminal 2 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Srilankan Airlines

Srilankan Airlines airlines operates from terminal 1 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Sudan Airways

Sudan Airways airlines operates from terminal 2 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Syrian Arab Airlines

Syrian Arab Airlines airlines operates from terminal 1 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Turkish Airlines

Turkish Airlines airlines operates from terminal 1 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Virgin Australia

Virgin Australia airlines operates from terminal 3 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Yemenia -Yemen Airways

Yemenia -Yemen Airways airlines operates from terminal 1 of Abu Dhabi International Airport in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.
